    feature selection in XGBoost

    ML_xgboost.Rd

    feature selection in XGBoost

    Usage

    ML_xgboost(mydata)

    Arguments

    mydata

    the data

    Value

    test

    Examples

    library(dplyr)
meta_dat1 <- t(meta_dat) %>%
  as.data.frame() %>%
  dplyr::mutate(group=group)
result_ML_xgboost <- ML_xgboost(meta_dat1)
